author: senh
title: The accessory every road-tripper needs
text: BING NEWS: Have you tried the palm cuff? Hand bracelet, handlet, palm cuff, hand band — known by many names, this is the accessory you need to add the missing spunk to your look. A jewellery native to the Middle East, it is now making its way to the must-have list of the well-dressed. 07/24/2015 - 7:45 am | View Link The accessory every road-tripper needs Chip Wade, a construction and design star on HGTV, knows how to help homeowners save space and face. (See “Elbow Room” and “Curb Appeal: The Block.”) But the man in the tool belt also has a life-saving tip for folks not at home but on the road ... 07/24/2015 - 7:22 am | View Link Gabrielle Karol and Benjamin Jacobs: After Years of Breakup Regret, He Wins Back the One Stubble makes an odd accessory on any well-dressed groom. But there was Benjamin Jacobs, debonair in his tuxedo, with enough blond fuzz on his cheeks to look as if he had forgotten to shave.
